Senior Oracle ERP Developer

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-11

Expired
Kohat Cement Company Ltd is seeking passionate professionals to fill the following position based at Head Office – Lahore. If you’re results-driven, analytical, and ready to make an impact, this is your chance! 🔹 Senior Oracle ERP Developer Role Snapshot Own end-to-end Oracle EBS (R12.2.x) development and integrations across Finance, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, and HR to keep our enterprise systems fast, stable, and audit-ready. Key Responsibilities Build/customize EBS (Forms, Reports, Workflows, Personalizations; OAF/ADF). Develop reports (SQL/PL/SQL, BI/XML Publisher; SSRS) and tune performance. Handle incident/problem management and Oracle SRs through closure. Support DB 19c–related app tasks (patching, object compilation, tablespaces) with DBA. Lead environment refreshes, cloning, upgrades, and regression testing. What You’ll Bring Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS/IT; 5–8+ years in Oracle EBS (R12.2.x) & DB 19c. Strong SQL/PL-SQL, Oracle Reports/Forms, BI/XML Publisher; OAF/ADF experience. Solid grasp of APIs/integrations, secure coding, and performance optimization. Plus: exposure to manufacturing processes and reporting/analytics tools is a bonus. Apply Now 📧 muhammad.mohsin@kohatcement.com 🗓 Deadline: 10 October 2025 Email subject: Senior Oracle ERP Developer – KCCL
📍 Lahore#Senior Oracle ERP Developer🧳 Experienced Required

Amazon Graphics Designer

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-15

Active
About Us At CommerceKind, we help brands scale on Amazon through expert strategies in PPC, product launches, private label growth, and supply chain optimization. With our creative and data-driven approach, we empower businesses to maximize visibility, boost conversions, and achieve long-term success on the world’s biggest marketplace. Job Title: Amazon Graphics Designer (On-Site) Salary Range Market Competitive Working Hours Monday to Friday, 5:00 PM – 2:00 AM Office Location Paragon City, Lahore Job Summary: We are looking for a talented Amazon Graphics Designer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually compelling designs that not only align with Amazon’s guidelines but also drive sales and captivate shoppers. Key Responsibilities Design Amazon Listing Images that enhance conversion rates while following Amazon’s guidelines. Create Infographics, A+ Content (EBC), Brand Store Designs, and promotional graphics. Collaborate with account managers, copywriters, and clients to deliver cohesive brand identity. Requirements Proven experience in Amazon listing design (portfolio required). Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and related design tools. Understanding of Amazon design best practices, image dimensions, and layout principles. Strong attention to detail, creativity, and communication skills. Ability to handle feedback and revisions efficiently. Bonus Skills (Nice to Have): Video Editing skills (Amazon product videos, brand story videos, etc.) Company Benefits: Free Residency (for Males) Medical Insurance Fuel Allowance Gratuity (as per company policy) Monday to Friday work schedule Apply Now: Send your updated resume to hr@commercekind.com
📍 Lahore#Amazon Graphics Designer🧳 Experienced Required

Supply Chain Officer

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-15

Active
📢 At Zara Shahjahan, we are looking for a dynamic and analytical Supply Chain Officer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for supporting strategic planning, analyzing business performance, and driving initiatives that align with our growth vision in the fashion industry. 📍Key Responsibilities: ▪ Support in developing and executing short-term and long-term business strategies. ▪ Analyze sales, financial, and operational data to recommend business improvements. ▪ Collaborate with design, retail, merchandising, and marketing teams to align strategies with brand goals. ▪ Prepare strategic reports, presentations, and performance dashboards for management. ▪ Monitor KPIs and ensure timely execution of business initiatives. ▪ Evaluate potential business partnerships, collaborations, and market expansions. ▪ Assist in budget planning and resource allocation. 📍Requirements: ▪ Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or related field. ▪ 6 Months-1 year of experience in supply chain, production planning, business strategy, or retail management (fashion industry preferred). ▪ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. ▪ Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. ▪ Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint); knowledge of business intelligence tools is a plus. ▪ Ability to work in a fast-paced, creative, and consumer-driven environment. 📍What We Offer: ▪ Opportunity to work with one of Pakistan’s leading fashion houses. ▪ A collaborative and innovative work environment. ▪ Competitive salary and benefits. ▪ Professional growth and career development opportunities. 📧 How to Apply Send your resume to careers@zarashahjahan.com with the subject line: “Supply Chain Officer Application”
📍 Lahore#Supply Chain Officer🧳 Fresh Required

Assistant Manager Finance

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-15

Active
🚀 We’re Hiring – Assistant Manager Finance 📍 Location: Karachi Join our dynamic team and play a key role in driving financial insights, cost efficiency, and strategic decision-making. Key Responsibilities: Lead annual budgeting, quarterly forecasting, and monthly variance analysis. Prepare management reports, MIS, dashboards, and financial presentations. Monitor and control costs, identifying efficiency and savings opportunities. Conduct ROI evaluations, scenario/sensitivity analysis, and support business cases. Automate recurring reports and drive process improvements using Excel, Power BI, and ERP systems. Qualifications & Requirements: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related field. 3–5 years of experience in FP&A, cost management, or financial analysis (services industry preferred). Strong financial modeling and data analysis expertise. Excellent analytical, communication, and stakeholder management skills. Proficiency in Excel (advanced), ERP systems, and BI tools. ✨ If you’re passionate about financial planning and want to make an impact, we’d love to hear from you! 📩 Apply at faisal.khan@avanzasolutions.com
